00013 from sample.Sample import Sample
00014 from pyre.components.Component import Component
00015 
00016 
00017 class MolDynamics(Component):
00018     '''This class serves as an API/interface for md engines.'''
00019     
00020     class Inventory(Component.Inventory):
00021         import pyre.inventory as inv  
00022         barostatParameter = inv.float('Barostat Parameter', default = 0.005)
00023         barostatParameter.meta['tip'] = '''barostat parameter to keep 
00024 fluctuations relatively small'''
00025         coordinateFormat = inv.str('Coordinate Format', default = 'cartesian')
00026         coordinateFormat.meta['tip'] = 'what format the coordinates are in'
00027         coordinateFormat.validator = inv.choice(['cartesian', 'fractional'])
00028         dumpFrequency = inv.float('Dump Frequency (ps)', default = 0.0)
00029         dumpFrequency.meta['tip'] = '''frequency at which a restart file is written'''
00030         ensemble= inv.str('Thermodynamic Ensemble', default = 'nve') 
00031         ensemble.validator=inv.choice(["nve", "nvt", "npt"])
00032         ensemble.meta['tip'] = 'thermodynamic ensemble (nve, nvt, npt, ...)'
00033         equilibrationTime = inv.float('Equilibration Time (ps)', default = 0.1)
00034         equilibrationTime.meta['tip'] = 'equilibration time of the simulation (ps)'
00035         logFilename = inv.str('Log Filename', default = 'molDynamics.log')
00036         logFilename.meta['tip'] = 'name of log file for md run'
00037         productionTime = inv.float('Production Time (ps)', default = 5.0)
00038         productionTime.meta['tip'] = 'production time of the simulation'
00039         restartFilename = inv.str('Restart Filename', default = 'molDynamics.res')
00040         restartFilename.meta['tip'] = '''restart file for md executable'''
00041         sample = inv.facility('Sample', default = Sample())
00042         sample.meta['importance'] = 10
00043         sample.meta['tip'] = 'piece of material being measured/simulated'
00044         sampleFrequency = inv.float('Properties Calculation Frequency (fs)', default = 5.0)
00045         sampleFrequency.meta['tip'] = '''frequency at which sampled properties are 
00046 written to trajectory and log file'''
00047         thermostatParameter = inv.float('Thermostat Parameter', default = 0.005)
00048         thermostatParameter.meta['tip'] = '''thermostat parameter to keep 
00049 fluctuations relatively small'''
00050         timeStep = inv.float('Time step (fs)', default = 0.5)
00051         timeStep.meta['tip'] = 'integration time step (ps)'
00052         trajectoryFilename = inv.str('Trajectory Filename', default='molDynamics')
00053         trajectoryFilename.meta['tip'] = 'name of trajectory file'
00054 
00055                         
00056     def __init__(self, name='MolDynamics', facility=None):
00057         Component.__init__(self, name, facility)
00058         self.ii=self.inventory
00059     
00060 #    def _configure(self):
00061 #        Component._configure(self)
00062 #        #self.sample = self.i.sample
00063     
00064     def equilibrationSteps(self):
00065         '''Number of time steps to reach equilibration'''
00066         if self.ii.timeStep==0:
00067             raise Exception, 'please set the time step to a nonzero value'
00068         else:
00069             val=int(self.ii.equilibrationTime/self.ii.timeStep)
00070         return val
00071     
00072     def productionSteps(self):
00073         '''Number of time steps to finish production'''
00074         if self.ii.timeStep==0:
00075             raise Exception, 'please set the time step to a nonzero value'
00076         else:
00077             return int(self.ii.productionTime/self.ii.timeStep)
00078 
00079     def execute(self):
00080         ''' subclasses (engines) must implement this class and parse appropriate 
00081 output files to get data as dataobjects which can be returned below'''
00082         raise NotImplementedError("class %r must override 'execute'" % self.__class__.__name__)
00083 
00084     def getFinalConfiguration(self):
00085         raise NotImplementedError("class %r must override 'execute'" % self.__class__.__name__)
00086     
00087     def getTrajectoryFile(self):
00088         raise NotImplementedError("class %r must override 'execute'" % self.__class__.__name__)
00089     
00090     def getMaterialProperties(self):
00091         raise NotImplementedError("class %r must override 'execute'" % self.__class__.__name__)
